```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's import a dataset.

```{r}
litters_df = 
  read_csv("E:/DATA SCIENCE I/Class/data_wrangling_1/data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv")
```

Look at your data!!

```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

Update the names in 'litters_df'.

```{r}
litters_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Look at the data.

```{r}
litters_df
```

Sometims skiming data is neat?

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

## Fix the missingness

```{r}
litters_df = 
  read_csv("E:/DATA SCIENCE I/Class/data_wrangling_1/data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("NA", ".", ""))
```

```{r}
pups_df =
  read_csv("E:/DATA SCIENCE I/Class/data_wrangling_1/data_import_examples/FAS_pups.csv",
           skip = 3,
           na = c("NA", ".", "")
  )

pups_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(pups_df)
```
